an3.142:1.1: “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, bhadre assajaniye desessami tayo ca bhadre purisajaniye.
an3.142:1.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an3.142:1.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an3.142:2.3: javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an3.142:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhadra assajaniya.
an3.142:3.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, tayo bhadra purisajaniya?
an3.142:3.3: javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an3.142:4.2: javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca?
an3.142:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an3.142:4.5: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho vissajjeti, no samsadeti.
an3.142:4.9: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhadro purisajaniyo javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an3.142:4.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhadra purisajaniya”ti.
